never burn what i earn come smart with the chips floss hard in the whip and most of these cats know im hard to get with so before they get going ima make em all quit - and sit and think about a strategy to get close to me cause right now youre just so-so to me i keep it so bitter - so gully so wizza so on and on know that lytes no quitter like that big bunny im on a mission for the money years later and the haters still want me without a cd released lytes platinum in the streets when they face the truth they cant compete when i grace the booth i show my steeze i got days of proof its about me i keep it movin like a locomotive you want a challenge come on lets toe-to-toe it
